site_name: 1 Buckland's WharfKingston Upon ThamesKT1 1TF
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of planning permission ref: 23/02859/CREG3 dated 18.01.2024.Reason: As required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Prior to the installation of any shutters, detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10 of the following features shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:- Detailed drawings and manufacturer's specifications, including finishes and method of attachment, of roller shuttersThe development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 3 (Detail drawings) of planning permission 23/02859/CREG3 (Replacement of existing timber doors and timber shopfront on the Ground Floor and First Floor with glazed entrance doors with curtain walling on the Ground and First Floor. Replacement of existing louvre. Replacement of timber infill above entrance doors with a bespoke louvre.) to allow removal of Condition 3.
